about_the_game:
Lovely Girls: Motion Comic invites you to explore a series of intimate, heart-warming, and sexual stories, each featuring a unique cast of beautiful characters. Transitioning from the graphic novel's static pages to the fluidity of motion comics, this game brings the charm of Lovely Girls to your screen in an entirely new way.

Features:

  • Dynamic Motion Comic Experience: Watch as each story comes alive with fluid animations and relaxing soundtracks.

  • Interactive Elements: Engage with the stories and control the speed of advancement so you can enjoy them at your own pace.

  • A Variety of Tales: From exciting encounters to playful mischief, each episode is a standalone story, perfect for binge-watching or savouring one at a time.

  • Gorgeous Art Style: Featuring high-quality illustrations brought to life with meticulous motion work from frame to frame.

  • Mature Themes: Designed for adult audiences, each story embraces mature content with taste and sophistication.

  • One Handed Playing: Enjoy the story with just a single click of the mouse or space bar to push the story forward, leaving your other hand free... for whatever.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains explicit adult content, including nudity, sexual themes, and mature situations. It is intended for players aged 18 and older.

All characters in the game are over 18 years old.

The stories include lesbian scenes, men and women scenes, toys, sex in public, sex with twins all of which are consensual.
